summary: This is an email exchange from Proton Mail between an unidentified sender and journalist Daniel Bates, discussing photos of Jeffrey Epstein and Peter Mandelson. The sender expresses confusion about Bates' role and claims Jean Luc wanted them to have pictures linking Epstein and Mandelson.

persons.name: Daniel Bates
persons.context: Recipient of an email discussing Epstein-Mandelson photos; identified as a journalist in New York.

persons.name: Peter Mandelson
persons.context: Described as 'a really really bad dude' and linked to Jeffrey Epstein through photos mentioned in the email.

persons.name: Jean Luc
persons.context: Person who allegedly wanted the email sender to have pictures of Epstein and Mandelson.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: Convicted sex offender mentioned in connection with Peter Mandelson through photos referenced in the email.

connections.description: Linked through photos that allegedly show their friendship, as referenced in the email and Daily Mail article.
Jean Luc wanted the sender to have pictures of Epstein and Mandelson, indicating some form of association or instruction.
Email exchange where sender questions Bates' role and discusses Epstein-Mandelson photos.

events.title: Email from Daniel Bates with Daily Mail article
events.description: Daniel Bates sends an email containing a link to a Daily Mail article about photos raising questions about Peter Mandelson's friendship with Jeffrey Epstein.

events.title: Response email questioning Bates' role
events.description: Unidentified sender responds to Daniel Bates, expressing confusion about whether he is 'the good guy or the bad guy' and mentioning Jean Luc's desire for them to have Epstein-Mandelson photos.

keyFacts: An unidentified individual questions journalist Daniel Bates about his role ('good guy or bad guy') regarding Epstein case coverage.
Peter Mandelson is described as 'a really really bad dude' and linked to Jeffrey Epstein through photos.
Someone named 'Jean Luc' allegedly wanted the email sender to possess pictures of Epstein and Mandelson together.
The email references a Daily Mail article from February 2025 about photos raising questions about Mandelson's 10-year friendship with Epstein.
